definitions.definition: Television , a television show , or a movie .
A short film clip, with or without audio (as in a music video , or one of the plethora of user-generated short movies on sites such as YouTube ).
examples: We made a video montage of Robbie for his fiftieth birthday.
Check out my new videos on YouTube.

definitions.definition: A motion picture stored on VHS or some other format .

main_definition: Television , a television show , or a movie .
secondary_definitions: A short film clip, with or without audio (as in a music video , or one of the plethora of user-generated short movies on sites such as YouTube ).
A motion picture stored on VHS or some other format .
